content.question: The form of Borobudur Temple creates an opportunity for the faithful to

choices.label: walk on an upward path toward enlightenment
move in a straight line toward the garbha griha, or “womb chamber”
experience the meditational power of a labyrinth

content.answer: walk on an upward path toward enlightenment

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.2: Purpose and Audience in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
